amendment.description: At the end of the bill before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___.None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to relocate or consolidate general and administrative functions, personnel, or resources of the Buffalo and Chicago Districts of the Corps of Engineers Great Lakes and Ohio River Division.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to relocate or consolidate general resources of the Buffalo and Chicago Districts of the Corps of Engineers Great Lakes and Ohio River Division.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Higgins.
